xwikidoc.name: LibrarySheet
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('DemoContent.Library.Code.LibraryClass')) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label for="DemoContent.Library.Code.LibraryClass_0_bookName">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('bookName', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('bookName') ; <label for="DemoContent.Library.Code.LibraryClass_0_author">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('author', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('author') ; <label for="DemoContent.Library.Code.LibraryClass_0_yearOfParution">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('yearOfParution', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('yearOfParution') ; <label for="DemoContent.Library.Code.LibraryClass_0_content1">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('content1', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('content1') ; <label for="DemoContent.Library.Code.LibraryClass_0_type">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('type', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('type') #if ($context.display == 'edit') ; <label for="DemoContent.Library.Code.LibraryClass_0_pocket">$doc.display('pocket')$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('pocket', false, false))</label> #else ; <label for="DemoContent.Library.Code.LibraryClass_0_pocket">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('pocket', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('pocket') #end ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
